comment:
"По клику на труп техномата возле неактивной турели
Можно сделать экшн на ее активацию, чтобы она потом постреляла по врагам"

languages.text: Турель устанавливалась в большой спешке, но техномат так и не успел активировать ее.
The turret was placed in a great hurry but the technomat never had the chance to activate it.
languages.original_text: Турель устанавливалась в большой спешке, но техномат так и не успел активировать ее.

traits.locale_text: The turret was placed in a great hurry but the technomat never got around to activating it.
The turret was placed in a great hurry but the technomat never got around to activating it.
The turret was placed in a great hurry but the technomat never had the chance to activate it.
The turret was placed in a great hurry but the technomat never had the chance to activate it.
The turret was placed in a great hurry but the technomat never had the chance to activate it.
The turret was placed in a great hurry but the technomat never had the chance to activate it.

languages.text: Das Geschütz wurde in großer Eile platziert, doch der Technomat kam nie dazu, es zu aktivieren.
languages.original_text: The turret was placed in a great hurry but the technomat never had the chance to activate it.

traits.locale_text: Das Geschütz wurde in großer Eile platziert, doch der Technomat kam nie dazu, es zu aktivieren.

languages.text: Cette tourelle a été installée en toute hâte, mais son technomate n'a pas eu le temps de l'activer.
languages.original_text: The turret was placed in a great hurry but the technomat never had the chance to activate it.

traits.locale_text: Cette tourelle a été installée en toute hâte, mais son technomate n'a pas eu le temps de l'activer.

languages.text: 这个炮塔是技工在极其匆忙的情况下设置的，甚至都没机会把它激活。
languages.original_text: The turret was placed in a great hurry but the technomat never had the chance to activate it.

traits.locale_text: 这个炮塔是技工在极其匆忙的情况下设置的，甚至都没机会把它激活。

languages.text: タレットは大急ぎで配置されたものの、テクノマットがそれを起動するチャンスは訪れなかった。
languages.original_text: The turret was placed in a great hurry but the technomat never had the chance to activate it.

traits.locale_text: タレットは大急ぎで配置されたものの、テクノマットがそれを起動するチャンスは訪れなかった。

languages.text: La torreta se colocó a toda prisa, pero el tecnómata no tuvo ocasión de activarla.
languages.original_text: The turret was placed in a great hurry but the technomat never had the chance to activate it.

traits.locale_text: La torreta se colocó a toda prisa, pero el tecnómata no tuvo ocasión de activarla.

languages.text: Taret alelacele yerleştirilmiş olsa da teknomatın onu çalıştıracak fırsatı olmamış.
languages.original_text: The turret was placed in a great hurry but the technomat never had the chance to activate it.

traits.locale_text: Taret alelacele yerleştirilmiş olsa da teknomatonun onu çalıştıracak fırsatı olmamış.
